title: Heavy Savings, Light Mouse: 33% Off Razer Viper V2 Pro Gaming Mouse
description: A lightweight mouse can be advantageous during gaming sessions, giving you the clutch you need to close out a match. You can grab the Razer Viper V2 Pro gaming mouse for $50 less right now.
content:
While some gaming mice offer extra buttons that could weigh them down, others remain minimalistic, like the Razer Viper V2 Pro. As a result, its lightweight size provides a degree of speed and control that others can't match. Now, you can grab it for $50 less at Newegg. For a deal under $100, you definitely don't want to miss out on it.

Billed as a successor to Razer's Viper Ultimate mouse , the V2 Pro is 20% lighter. Its built-in grips, right side buttons, and RGB were removed to give gamers more efficiency and speed. It also touts a 25% faster connection than other conventional gaming mice. This will help players reduce latency and increase responsiveness, giving them a crucial advantage. With up to 80 hours of battery life, the V2 Pro makes sure that your gaming sessions won't be interrupted. A quality gaming mouse can make the difference between victory and defeat in games like Overwatch 2 and Valorant.

Our hardware writer, Zachary Cuevas, awarded it an "Excellent" rating. In our Razer Viper V2 Pro review , he said, "Tons of small changes morph the Razer Viper V2 Pro gaming mouse into a perfect match for esports players looking for the lightest and fastest controller."
